title: Global Happiness and Economic Development in 2018
description: An integrated dataset examining the relationship between economic development indicators and national happiness across 144 countries in 2018. Combines data from the World Happiness Report 2018 and Gapminder Global Development Data to analyze correlations between GDP per capita, life expectancy, HDI, and happiness scores.
